bibl.title: An Enigmatic Piece of Leather from Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast)
bibl.note: Joint University of Delaware - Leiden University expedition, 1994-2001. Observations on the leather from Berenike and more specifically on an enigmatic piece (Inv. BE00-33.013 2147-J-0164; 67 mm x 51 mm) from the early Roman trash dump. The authors suggest that this piece was part of a writing tablet.
bibl.seg: VELDMEIJER André J. and Sigrid M. VAN ROODE, An Enigmatic Piece of Leather from Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast).

Joint University of Delaware - Leiden University expedition, 1994-2001. Observations on the leather from Berenike and more specifically on an enigmatic piece (Inv. BE00-33.013 2147-J-0164; 67 mm x 51 mm) from the early Roman trash dump. The authors suggest that this piece was part of a writing tablet.
